attributes.action: Reduce tax on all services/ fuel/gas/electricity/food/ until  Ukraine issue over
attributes.additional_details: British people should NOT have to just keep  paying increases when the Government are applying such massive taxes on goods & food.
attributes.background: Reduce taxation on all product in the UK until this Russian invasion of Ukraine is over

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce the standard rate of VAT to help with increased cost of living: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609147

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Cut the VAT charged on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470
